import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { instituteAPI } from '../../services/api'; import './HomePage.css'; const HomePage = () => { const [featuredInstitutes, setFeaturedInstitutes] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ institutes: 0, reviews: 0, students: 0 }); useEffect(() => { fetchFeaturedInstitutes(); fetchStats(); }, []); const fetchFeaturedInstitutes = async () => { try { const response = await instituteAPI.getAll(); setFeaturedInstitutes(response.data.slice(0, 6)); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching institutes:', error); } }; return (
